titleInfo.title: 'A handbook of Syria (including Palestine). London: Naval Staff Intelligence Department, June 1919'

physicalDescription.extent: The volume contains a contents page (folio 6) and an index (folios 338-365).

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 367; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the volume also contains an original printed pagination sequence. The volume originally contained fourteen plates showing maps, bound into the back of the volume. These are now missing; details of the plates can be found at folio 5v.

mods.abstract: Admiralty handbook regarding Syria (including Palestine) 'to as far north as the River Orontes and a line Antioch-Aleppo-Meskeneh.
